穧字的基本解释

穧
jì
收割。
割下来没有捆的农作物：“彼有不获稚，此有不敛穧。”
量词（ａ．古代容量单位，即“撮”；ｂ．刈禾把数，四把为穧）。

穧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jì］
［《廣韻》子計切，去霽，精。］
［《廣韻》子例切，去祭，精。］
［《廣韻》在詣切，去霽，從。］
(1)收割谷物。
(2)指收割后的禾束。

穧字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　穧； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页861第12
【唐韻】在詣切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】才詣切，?音劑。【說文】穫刈也。一曰撮也。【廣韻】刈禾把數。【詩·小雅】此有不斂穧。【疏】穧，禾之鋪而未束者。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?子例切，音祭。又【集韻】疾二切，音自。又在禮切，音薺。又疾智切，音漬。義?同。　又【集韻】同䆅。積禾也。

穧字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
穧字的起名意思

暂无。

穧
Basic explanation of words
穧
jì
Harvest.
The crops that are cut down without bundles: "There is no juvenile, and there is no sluggishness."
Quantifiers (a. The ancient unit of capacity, that is, "zuo"; b. The number of mowing, four as 穧).
穧
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jì］
["Guang Yun" Zi Ji cut, go to Ji, fine. ]
["Guangyun" sub-case cut, go to sacrifice, fine. ]
["Guangyun" is cutting, go to Ji, from. ]
(1) Harvesting grains.
(2) Refers to the bunches after harvest.
穧
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [He Zi Department] 　穧; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 861 No. 12
[Tang Yun] It’s not until you cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun]. [Said the text] It is also mowed. One said a pinch. [Guangyun] Mowing the number of grasses. [Poetry·Xiaoya] This is not constricted. 【Sparse】He is the place where the hemp is laid without being bundled.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Zi Rou Qi, sound sacrifice. Also 【Jiyun】The sound is self-sufficient. In Liqie again, Yin Nai. He is quick and wise, sound stains. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] The same thing. Jihe also.
穧
